My research is mainly in the field of Software Engineering (SE) and Internet of Things (IoT) and includes Artificial Intelligence (AI) / Machine Learning (ML) . The main research areas in which my investigations focus on are: Engineering Intelligent and Trustworthy IoT Systems, Software Architectures, Quality, and Self-Adaptive systems during development, deployment, and operation of complex modern systems while striving for more sustainable software and society. Some of the application areas I investigate are, e.g.: Smart Cities, Smart Building, Edge Computing, and (Web) Services -to mention few.
